verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will worship,
With all of my heart
I will praise you,
With all of my strength
I will seek you,
All of my days
I will follow,
All of your ways

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I will give,
You all my worship
I will give,
You all my praise
You alone,
I long to worship
You alone,
Are worthy of my praise

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I will bow down,
And hail you as king
I will serve you
I will give you everything
I will lift up
My eyes to your throne
I will trust you,
I will trust you alone
